entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
